Line1.1029AF: Do--do you see him too? The ghost of...Corik, my son. When he was a boy, he was taken to the Black Asylum, and now he haunts my every moment. Calling to me...begging that I...
Line3.1029AF: I don't know how much more I can stand. Please, I'll pay you, end his torments. Please, see that he is laid to rest.
